price: 72. Mpe baye batatolaka na lokuta te, mpe soki bakutani na makambo mazanga ntina, bapesi yango mokongo,
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشۡهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِٱللَّغۡوِ مَرُّواْ كِرَامٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna lā yashhadūna al-zūra wa-idhā marrū bil-laghwi marrū kirāman
